summary.span: 允许将多个集合和项作为一个列表显示。

span.span: Enables multiple collections and items to be displayed as a single list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含字符串、对象、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 节点、元素以及其他集合等项。 can contain items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, as well as other collections. 使用 中的数据，根据其 生成其内容。An uses the data in the to generate its content according to its . 有关使用 对象绑定到集合的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)中的 "绑定到集合" 一节。For more information about using objects to bind to collections, see the Binding to Collections section of the [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview).
